item.description: Friday night- Beer, Wine and Snacks Meet and Greet, Welcome Party Saturday and Sunday- Make your own Breakfast ( breakfast foods provided) Canoe ( two per canoe) or Kayak Rental ( Deduct $25 from Package Price if you are bringing your own canoe or kayak) Picnic lunch on the Saco River Saturday night Lobster, Chicken, and Steak Dinner with corn on the Cob, baked potato and dessert (BYOB) WHAT TO BRING and detailed schedule : WILL FOLLOW FOR THOSE WHO ARE INTERESTED WE CAN CAR POOL Weekend package: $85.00 plus $48 for the whole weekend. Deduct $25 for your own Kayak. DEADLINE: JULY 8TH MAKE CHECKS OUT TO WAYNE POTTER LET ME KNOW IF YOU ARE INTERESTED AND I WILL SEND IN THE FORMS NEEDED I have gone several years and have enjoyed each time I go. Come and join me and 90 other kayakers for this great weekend down the Saco River in North Conway, NH,, great places to hike too.

group.name: Lebanon/White River Junction Hiking Meetup Group

item.name: SKI WHEELERS' CANOE/KAYAK WEEKEND
